statements: UPDATE device_management SET device_status = FALSE WHERE device_id = 1;
UPDATE device_management SET last_checkin = now() WHERE device_location = 'Main Building';
UPDATE device_management SET device_name = 'Printer', device_status = FALSE WHERE device_id = 1;
UPDATE device_management SET last_checkin = NOW(), device_status = TRUE, device_type = 'Scanner' WHERE device_location = 'Room A';
UPDATE devices SET operational_status = true WHERE device_id = 1;
UPDATE commands SET command_status = 'Completed', command_result = 'Success' WHERE command_id = 5;
UPDATE devices SET operational_status = FALSE, last_checked_in = '2022-09-15 09:30:00' WHERE device_id = 1;
UPDATE commands SET command_status = 'Completed', command_result = 'Success' WHERE device_id = 2 AND command_type = 'Reboot' AND created_at > '2022-09-15';
UPDATE devices SET status='inactive' WHERE device_id=101;
UPDATE device_commands SET command_status='completed', command_name='Restart' WHERE device_id=201;
UPDATE devices SET status = 'inactive' WHERE device_id = 1;
UPDATE device_commands SET command_status = 'completed' WHERE device_id = 2;
UPDATE remote_devices SET device_location='Office' WHERE device_id=1;
UPDATE device_status SET status_code=1, last_updated=NOW() WHERE device_id=2;
UPDATE remote_devices SET device_name = 'New Device 1', device_location = 'Room A' WHERE device_id = 1;
UPDATE device_status SET status_code = 200, last_updated = '2022-01-15 09:30:00' WHERE device_id = 2;
UPDATE devices SET location = 'New York' WHERE device_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE users SET email = 'newemail@example.com' WHERE user_id = '789abcde-f012-34ab-cdef-901234567890';
UPDATE devices SET location = 'Room A' WHERE device_name = 'Device 1';
UPDATE users SET email = 'newemail@example.com' WHERE username = 'user123';
